chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
x: nat
ll: list nat

Goal:
nat_sorted (x :: ll) -> Forall (lt x) ll

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Forall : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop
lt = fun n m : nat => S n <= m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments lt (_ _)%nat_scope
nat_sorted = fun ll : list nat => forall (l : list nat) (a : nat) (m : list nat) (b : nat) (r : list nat), ll = l ++ a :: m ++ b :: r -> a < b : list nat -> Prop Arguments nat_sorted _%list_scope
in_nat_sorted_3 : forall (x : nat) (ll : list nat), Forall (lt x) ll -> nat_sorted ll -> nat_sorted (x :: ll)
in_nat_sorted_2 : forall (x y : nat) (ll : list nat), x < y -> nat_sorted (y :: ll) -> nat_sorted (x :: y :: ll)
nat_sorted_cons_inv : forall (x : nat) (ll : list nat), nat_sorted (x :: ll) -> nat_sorted ll
Forall_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (x : X) (ll : list X), Forall P (x :: ll) < -> P x /\ Forall P ll
list_injective_inv : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (ll : list X), list_injective (x :: ll) -> ~ In x ll /\ list_injective ll
lmax_spec : forall (l : list nat) (x : nat), lmax l <= x < -> Forall (fun y : nat => y <= x) l
Forall_rev : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (ll : list X), Forall P ll -> Forall P (rev ll)
in_nat_sorted_1 : forall x : nat, nat_sorted (x :: nil)
Forall_filter : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (f : X -> bool) (ll : list X), Forall P ll -> Forall P (filter f ll)
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
Forall_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> SProp), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
Inductive Ltl (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA nil (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (b :: y) | Lt_tl : forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Relation_Operators.Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
Forall_map : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (P : Y -> Prop) (ll : list X), Forall P (map f ll) < -> Forall (fun x : X => P (f x)) ll
RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz : forall C : Type, nat -> list nat -> RingMicromega.Psatz C -> list nat
Permutation.Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
Forall_and : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l -> Forall Q l -> Forall (fun x : A => P x /\ Q x) l
seq = fix seq (start len : nat) {struct len} : list nat := match len with | 0 => nil | S len0 => start :: seq (S start) len0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments seq (_ _)%nat_scope
list_an = fix list_an (a n : nat) {struct n} : list nat := match n with | 0 => nil | S n0 => a :: list_an (S a) n0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments list_an (_ _)%nat_scope
Forall_impl : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop) (ll : list X), (forall x : X, In x ll -> P x -> Q x) -> Forall P ll -> Forall Q ll
Forall_and_inv : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall (fun x : A => P x /\ Q x) l -> Forall P l /\ Forall Q l
nat_new = fun l : list nat => S (lmax l) : list nat -> nat Arguments nat_new _%list_scope
Exists_Forall_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, P x \/ ~ P x) -> Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l < -> ~ Forall P l
list_max = fun l : list nat => fold_right Init.Nat.max 0 l : list nat -> nat Arguments list_max _%list_scope
list_sum = fun l : list nat => fold_right Init.Nat.add 0 l : list nat -> nat Arguments list_sum _%list_scope
Forall_forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> P x)
exists_Forall : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (l : list B), (exists k : A, Forall (P k) l) -> Forall (fun x : B => exists k : A, P k x) l
RingMicromega.extract_hyps : forall C : Type, C -> list (RingMicromega.NFormula C) -> list nat -> list (RingMicromega.NFormula C)
Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
list_injective_rect : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> Type), P nil -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), ~ In x l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_injective l -> P l
Forall2_Forall : forall (X : Type) (R : X -> X -> Prop) (ll : list X), Forall2 R ll ll < -> Forall (fun x : X => R x x) ll
NoDup_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
lsum = fold_right Init.Nat.add 0 : list nat -> nat Arguments lsum _%list_scope
lmax = fold_right Nat.max 0 : list nat -> nat Arguments lmax _%list_scope
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
in_nat_sorted_0 = fun l : list nat => match l as l0 return (forall (a : nat) (m : list nat) (b : nat) (r : list nat), nil = l0 ++ a :: m ++ b :: r -> a < b) with | nil => fun (a : nat) (m : list nat) (b : nat) (r : list nat) (H : nil = nil ++ a :: m ++ b :: r) => let H0 : False := eq_ind nil (fun e : list nat => match e with | nil => True | _ :: _ => False end) I (nil ++ a :: m ++ b :: r) H in False_ind (a < b) H0 | n :: l0 => fun (a : nat) (m : list nat) (b : nat) (r : list nat) (H : nil = (n :: l0) ++ a :: m ++ b :: r) => let H0 : False := eq_ind nil (fun e : list nat => match e with | nil => True | _ :: _ => False end) I ((n :: l...
Permutation.Permutation_list_sum = fun (l1 l2 : list nat) (HP : l1 ~p l2) => Permutation.Permutation_ind (fun l3 l4 : list nat => list_sum l3 = list_sum l4) eq_refl (fun (x : nat) (l l' : list nat) (_ : l ~p l') (IHHP : list_sum l = list_sum l') => f_equal_nat nat (Init.Nat.add x) (list_sum l) (list_sum l') IHHP) (fun (x y : nat) (l : list nat) => eq_ind_r (fun n : nat => y + n = x + (y + list_sum l)) (eq_ind_r (fun n : nat => y + (list_sum l + x) = n) (Nat.add_assoc y (list_sum l) x) (Nat.add_comm x (y + list_sum l))) (Nat.add_comm x (list_sum l))) (fun (l l' l'' : list nat) (_ : l ~p l') (IHHP1 : list_sum l = list_sum l')...
Permutation.Permutation_list_max = fun (l1 l2 : list nat) (HP : l1 ~p l2) => Permutation.Permutation_ind (fun l3 l4 : list nat => list_max l3 = list_max l4) eq_refl (fun (x : nat) (l l' : list nat) (_ : l ~p l') (IHHP : list_max l = list_max l') => f_equal_nat nat (Init.Nat.max x) (list_max l) (list_max l') IHHP) (fun (x y : nat) (l : list nat) => eq_ind_r (fun n : nat => Init.Nat.max y n = Init.Nat.max x (Init.Nat.max y (list_max l))) (eq_ind_r (fun n : nat => Init.Nat.max y (Nat.max (list_max l) x) = n) (Nat.max_assoc y (list_max l) x) (Nat.max_comm x (Init.Nat.max y (list_max l)))) (Nat.max_comm x (list_max l))) (fun (l l' l'' : list nat)...
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l) Arguments Exists [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_hd [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope

```  
intros x ll H.
inversion H.
- apply Forall_cons_inv in H2.
  apply H2. 
- apply nat_sorted_cons_inv in H0.
  apply in_nat_sorted_3 in H2.
  apply H2.
  + apply H1.
  + apply H0.
```

original: intros x ll H. inversion H. - apply Forall_cons_inv in H2. apply H2. - apply nat_sorted_cons_inv in H0. apply in_nat_sorted_3 in H2. apply H2. + apply H1. + apply H0.
